segments.text: The water is pouring out of the sink, creating a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman drying dishes hasn't noticed it yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, but she seems completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so mischievous, climbing to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm worried the boy is going to fall, standing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for a cookie, her hand outstretched and ready.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so peaceful, it's a nice contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what the woman is thinking about, being so distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is a disaster, but she seems completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she realizes what's happening before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
